definition: sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient

sentences.english: Patients must not be attacked, and ambulances and hospitals must not be misused.
sentences.chinese: 不得袭击伤病员，不得将救护车和医院用于其他目的。

sentences.english: The number of the sick was increasing with appalling rapidity .
sentences.chinese: 病员的数量正以惊人的速度增加。

sentences.english: The nurse always treated the sick and wounded with kindness.
sentences.chinese: 这位护士总是以蔼然可亲的态度对待伤病员。

sentences.english: Because of the huge number of patients, these hospitals need more doctors.
sentences.chinese: 由于伤病员的数目惊人，这些医院需要更多的医生。

sentences.english: To place medicine on a wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士正在给伤病员敷药。

sentences.english: The sick and wounded were soon taken to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 伤病员很快被送往医院。

sentences.english: But the man was already dead and the patients were laughing to see the orderly trying to wake a dead man.
sentences.chinese: 病员们都笑那个护理员在叫一个死人醒过来。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo evaluate the effect of initial consultation system in order to provide satisfactory service for patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估首问负责制的效果，为病员提供满意的服务。

sentences.english: The nurse is applying the medicine to the injured soldier.
sentences.chinese: 护士正在给伤病员敷药。

sentences.english: The nurses helped the wounded soldiers into the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 护士们搀扶着伤病员走进医院。

sentences.english: The wounded are being taken good care of here now.
sentences.chinese: 现在伤病员们在这里受到了很好照顾。

sentences.english: We hid our patients in the shelter during the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争年代我们把伤病员藏在掩蔽部。

sentences.english: The fog particles are sent to patients through a faceshield or an inhaler.
sentences.chinese: 该雾粒通过面罩或吸入器送至病员。

definition: sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
